title: 3 dead, 5 injured as Delhi gangs shoot it out on streets
title_page: 3 dead, 5 injured  as Delhi gangs shoot it out on streets | Latest India News |  Onmanorama | India News Headlines • Read Latest News from India • Breaking News • Politics • Crime Stories • News Updates from all States in India • Onmanorama
text:
New Delhi: Three people, including a woman, were killed and five others were injured in shooting between two gangs here on Monday, police said.
Deputy commissioner of police Jatin Narwal said gun shots were fired from two SUVs with members of gangs led by Gogi and Tillu aboard on the busy roads of Sant Nagar in Burari area around 10 am.
A 37-year-old woman, who was passing by, got shot and lost her life.
The other two deceased have been identified as Mukul, a 15-year-old member of the Tillu gang, and Sanjeet, 30, a suspected member of the Gogi gang.
Of the five injured, two were civilians and the others were gang members.
